google_play_reviews.content: Works on TX-NR595

Thank you for providing a functional app to control and manage my Onkyo AVR. Why Onkyo has failed miserably at this task is a big mystery to me. I have only been using it for a day, but it seems to be capable of performing all of the actions that I desire. I was starting to regret buying Onkyo, but I think this app will allow me to enjoy my AVR for many years.
So much better than the Onkyo app! This app actually works and works great. Great job!!
Best remote for Onkyo controller...much better than original
Brilliant! Worth every penny to support further development and maintenance of this app!
I have used onkyo's app for years and always hated it. This one worked straight away and even handles zone 2 audio for my new pioneer elite 105. Outstanding!
Great app. Thank you!!!
Awesome app. Way better than the official app.

I'm not sure I have words...I've had apps for this and other receivers. Calling those other apps "apps" does a dis-service to this beauty. I've only played with it for 5 minutes, and I want to hug the developer. 10 stars out of 5!

Like others have said, this is an improvement over the branded app  I went looking for a specific solution but haven't fond it on your app yet.  I have 2 onkyo receivers (one in the basement that  uses main zone for inside and zone 2 for outside speakers) (other receiver is family room for main and zone 2 is kitchen speakers)  looking for a way to play same source across all 4 "zones"  seems i can group the 2 main zones bit don't see zone 2 available to group.  Is this possible or in premium ver

Of all the official Onkyo apps, this one (which is not official) actually works! I love the function that opens my receiver when the app starts, and I can use the volume buttons on the phone to control volume. The only feedback I have is about the name of the app, but this is not the app's fault: when I try to set up Google assistant routines with it, and use the "open" command, the assistant performs a Google search instead of actually opening that app.🤦 Other apps open without a problem 🤷
Onkyo should make this app their official one
Doesn't work either. On onkyo tx-nr696 at least.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Onkyo TX-NR696 is fully supported. I think there is a problem with the network on your receiver. Please de-attach the receiver from A/C and plug in it again in order to reset the network module. If it does not help, please write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Superb app. The official Onkyo/Pioneer app would hardly work at all on my current phone. Minor problem - I can't find how to display RDS.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! RDS information is not provided by the receiver, this is a limitation of the Onkyo network protocol. RDS is only displayed on the receiver built-in display, and the app only allows to change the display mode for this information.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app so far. Does more than anyremote I know of.

Once in a while comes along a brilliant Developer .....This works so much better than the Official Onkyo app and does so much more. It also works on old versions of Android V5. Try this app you wont be disappointed. Big Thank you to Developer
It was working great for about a day then it stopped working. Not sure if it's the app or the receiver but I do wish it would have kept working.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Network part of the Onkyo receivers is not really stable. In order to reboot it, please temporary disconnect your receiver from the AC power.

google_play_reviews.content: Trying to connect to Onkyo 929. When clicking connect it asks for address? What does that mean? Thanks. The Onkyo remote app stopped connecting months ago.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: yes, the app needs to know the IP address of the receiver in your network. You can either put it manually if you select menu "Connect", or the app will try to find the receiver and discover the address automatically, if you select menu "Search".

google_play_reviews.content: Great app, use it all day. It would be helpful for me if a few functions for zone 1 and 2 were to work simultaneously. Features such as volume, mute and on / off. (It is not possible to make a group of zone 1 and 2)

Perfect addition to my stereo receiver. Great work, dev! I wanted to ask if it is possible to add a notification tray on the phone with currently playing song and controls, this the only feature that ia really missing at this point. This and adding songs from multiple folders to a queu which maybe isn't possible.
Won't connect to my onkyo receiver, it sees it but, when selected won't connect. Onkyo TX-NR828. Seems to have worked better for the last few months but now it won't take the receiver out of standby.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for feedback. Many people write me, that the factory reset of the receiver may help in this situatinon, while the Onkyo firmware is sometime instable.

google_play_reviews.content: Worked on my receiver perfectly the first night and then wouldn't connect again. I Uninstalled and reinstalled and still wouldn't work.
Works great!! Easy to download and understand!! Highly recommend!!! 💪
Great app. And unlike the official onkyo-app, it has one feature that is really important to me: switch between A/B speakers.

Great app, much better than the controller app developed by onkyo. However both apps are missing the "mode" button which allows you to keep the audio input active and switch the video input to the last used input allowing the user to listen to music while watching TV or gaming. This would be a nice addition in general and would be even better if it could be added to the shortcut command to just have one touch to switch to your favorite audio channel and keep the video input active.
Great app, but is it possible to connect 2 different receivers on the same app? I have 1 for upstairs and one for downstairs but can't seem to add another device.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! Yes, it is possible. Please select item "Connect" from app menu and enter IP address of the second device manually. If it does not work please write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Top bannana
Free, no ads, works great, all features, solid and very good experience! Thank you dev!
Works perfectly where the official Onkyo app fails.
What a great small app! Would it be possible to edit the input names on the phone and for the change to be transmitted to the receiver?
Works well even with a quite old Onkyo TX-8050. Functionality is the same as in the native app, but I like this app for UI design and flexibility. Thanks!
Convenient control of my Onkyo TX-RZ730
Better than the original onkyo app!! . More features and cleaner looking. I would preffer bigger volume buttons and possition them lower. Cool development, thanks.

Works like a charm on my VSX-932! Great interface and functionality! Приложение сказка! Гораздо удобнее и богаче по функционалу в сравнении с официальным! Миша, спасибо огромное! Пожалуйста, дорабатывай функционал, расширяй модельный ряд и делай его платным!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Роман, спасибо за отзыв! Если есть желание, заходи на https://github.com/mkulesh/onpc и присоединяйся к обсуждению текущих задач. Или пиши новые идеи на mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Really what the OEM app should have been.
very good
Genuinely the best control app for Onkyo/Pioneer systems. Definitely recommend!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! Could you please write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com and we can try to solve the problem.

google_play_reviews.content: Seamless connection to my Onkyo. Far better than original Onkyo application

There are not enough superlatives to describe this fantastic app! Like all the other reviewers, I gave up on the horrible Onkyo apps years ago! The only issue I find is if you have the app installed on two devices (tablet and cell phone) and it is running on the first device, it will crash if the second device tries to access the receiver. Not a deal breaker, simple power cycle the receiver and limit use to one device! Thank-you Mikhail for writing this app! I no longer have to return inside when listening to zone two on my patio to change Pandora settings or turning down the volume when the wife complains!
Awesome to be able to select audio mode from a list rather then cycling through options.
So much better than the stock app,
Not bad.
This app is just perfect. Works 100x better than the "official" onkyo app. Super reliable, no ads, who could ask for more?

Works on Onkyo TX-NR525 and is far better than the stock Onkyo app. Access to the standard and quick setup menus is priceless, change listen modes and audio equalizer are fast to find and easy to use and a lot faster than using the physical Onkyo remote. Awesome work!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback and donation! If you have any idea how to improve the app please write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Just tried first time, works with Onkyo TX NR 414, do far everything works, thanks.
I have been waiting for years for this app. Trying all those bad Onkyo apps. This one is perfect, finally I can enjoy my hifi system as it was meant to best. Big thank you.
So much better than the Onko developed controller. Now just using this app to play music from server to tx nr 686.

Great App! So much better than the Onkyo app. Thank you so much! Update 07/15/2020: no longer connects to the receiver and app freezes :( Update 07/23/20: Follows the recommendation, I didn't do a full reset but power cycled the receiver and now works. Thank you for the great communication.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, in the case of a connection problem, please try to perform the factory reset of the receiver. It may help to solve the problem.

google_play_reviews.content: Hi. Does your app work with pioneer lx302 it just says device not responding
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Chris! Unfortunately I have no expirience with LX-302. However, there are known problems with Onkyo network protocol that may produce such a behaviour that you obserwe. Please take a look on this page: https://github.com/mkulesh/onpc/wiki/Connection-problems
May be one of the actions listed there will help to solve your problem.

google_play_reviews.content: Works great with my Onkyo HT-RC560! Thank you!
Just excellent! Really. Full control of my Onkyo TX-NR777 via wifi. It also controls a 2 gig usb connected ssd with my flac collection of 9000 songs. Always connects. Smooth as silk.
This app is better than onkyo's remote. However, would it possible to integrate an option to play music from your android mobile device, or music apps already located on your mobile device?
With my Onkyo Tx830 I can play main, zone 2&3 respectively, love 💋 it
This app is a great improvement over the vendor apps! Love it!
Works with Pioneer VSX-831. Thank you.
Thank you!! Works perfect!

I finally got my receiver to link up. Is there a way to get my cd player to connect as well? I can control the volume, but I can't stop, play or skip songs. If I could figure out how to get the app to connect to the Onkyo CD player this would be 5 stars.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for feedback! Did you tried to use menu "Connect" instead of "Search"? Is it possible to connect your receiver if you manually put the IP address and port 60128 in the "Connect" dialog?

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you for this great app, recently I gave up on the Onkyo app, it kept crashing, and I was even considering buying a newer reciever.
NR838. Nearly worked. Started off working and then I can't get it to reconnect.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Some people wrote me that the network on some Onkyo models may work unstable. Please perform factory reset of the receiver, it may help to solve the connection problem. See https://github.com/mkulesh/onpc/wiki/Connection-problems for more details.

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you for creating this app. It is 1000x better than the Onkyo Controller app!

What a relief to see an app that is fully functional and works great with my Integra receiver. Awesome replacement to the ever buggy Onkyo app I was using earlier which stopped working on Andriod 10 device. I would like to see a few more preset listening modes including THX that Integra receiver support. Thank you Mikhail for what you have done and your time. I have sent a request to add a few more preset listening modes.
Awesome app. Thank you! Do you have plans to realize music streaming from phone like in the original app?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback. Currently, I do not plan to implement the music streaming from phone since such a task has too high effort for a single developer who develops the app just as a hobby. If somebody may help with the implementation I will provide full support for it.

google_play_reviews.content: AWESOME app! I wish you had a donations page.
Finally a good app...

Can i donate to you? This is the best app to control an Onkyo reciever. In the Onkyo remote and app, if you want to change the output type(Direct, Stereo, Dolby surround etc etc) you'd have to cycle through all the options. That's 10+ options. And if you accidentally skip over the desired you'd have do the entire thing again. This app gives you the list of all the possible output types and you just click to chose. Makes life so much easier. 10 stars
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for feedback! Currently, not all modes are presented in the list. If some listening modes are missing for you in the selection list, you can just write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com and I can add them. If you like to donate, please  do it on my PayPal account: mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Works perfectly fine
Would be nice to have Cable TV channel lineup info when hdmi arc or tv is selected..
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chris. The app uses a proprietary Onkyo protocol to communicate with the receiver. Currently, I am not able to find such commands in the protocol documentation. I think it is impossible. Does the official Onkyo app show this information?

google_play_reviews.content: Comparing with the garbage application which Onkyo/Pioneer is giving to the customers, this app is awesome. Thanks for the time and effort. I was about to send back my stereo but this all just works like a charm.
An open source and a superior alternative to the Onkyo branded apps
Amazing. Easy. Onkyo should buy it from you. Thank you.
This app is gold!! So much more advanced than Onkyo's app. 5 STARS.

Works great on my Pioneer SC-LX701 receiver! Pioneer has not update their official app in years and their app no longer works on Android 9 or higher. But this app seems to support all the major functions and zones! Thank you soooo much!
Best Remote Ever! Controls my Teac NT-503 flawlessly. Seamless access to NAS, and even remote volume control playing DSD files!!
What a find! After years of struggling with the Onkyo apps, this makes things super easy and intuitive! It's also open source!!!

What a phenomenal improvement over the app that Onkyo/Pioneer supplies! Thank you so much for putting in the time and effort to do this. So intuitive and useful! I found this because I was monkeying around with the Github repo you forked as the basis of this app. One unfortunate problem I am having with the app is that the Setup (gear) button does nothing. The "Quick menu" (three lines) button works as expected and brings up on-screen menu just fine. But, Setup does nothing from any state of the receiver or the app. Would love to see this fixed. Let me know how I can help (I am not familiar with Android development, but I can test!)
fantastic. I installed it when my physical remote started malfunctioning. does everything that I need to do on a routine basis. easy to set up and use. nice job!
Very good! Onkyo developers can learn from you.
ONKYO developers: watch and learn how to make an app!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! I am not sure that Onkyo developers read reviews for alternative apps. I am also not sure that Onkyo developers know that such an app exists.

google_play_reviews.content: wow, funktioniert klasse! viel besser als die originale "Remote"-App! Danke!
Awesome app, lovely developer, highly responsive to all issues
Only thís app works (very) well with my Onkyo receiver. (TX-NR636)

Just installed it a couple of minutes ago, but I can confidently say this is light years ahead of Onkyo Controller app! Using it for Onkyo TX-8250. I will gladly help testing or debugging, just let me know. Great work!
Great job, blows away the official onkyo controller! Finally a 'replace queue' function for the play queue. App in general solid and quick. Using on tx-8260. Thank you!
Great app massive improvement on the standard onkyo app which is often slow and unresponsive. Like the different skins too
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! If you like to test a new version that will be released soon, please write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com or visit the project page on github.com/mkulesh/onpc

google_play_reviews.content: I cant set up sleep time. After tapping sleep time button it disappears.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! In order to fix this problem, I need application log. Could you please contact me per email: mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Volume control on onkyo zone 2 (audio control) not showing up
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! In order to solve this problem I need some more technical information. Could you please contact me per email: mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: After earlier issues getting receiver connected I decided to try again four months later. Glad I did... I was able to get my 4 yr old Onkyo connected to the app and it is working perfectly. Love how you can control so many aspects of the receiver from my phone.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please try the "Search" command from the application menu. If this command shows your receiver, just select it to connect. If this commend shows you no results, it means that the app is unfortunatelly not compatible with your device.

google_play_reviews.content: Amazing, my cr-n 765 "reborn". All works great, and fast. One thing not working, button "next track" and "prev track" when i play from network source "home media". I check "play\pause" work properly.
Thanks for the App! FYI works with Onkyo R-N855! Dev is a very nice guy willing to help! Congratulations!!!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback and sorry for delayed response. I can try to fix the problem with stopping playback. However I need more information about your receiver. Could you please write me per Email on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com with more detailed description when the does playback stopp and when not.

google_play_reviews.content: Works great much better than Onkyo app

There are no instructions on how to hook this app to my onkyo tx-nr646?  After consulting with Mikhail  I am changing my review to awesome!!!   This is a truly awesome app for my onkyo set up!  Thank you so much to Mikhail for the great support...i love it!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, in order to connect receiver, please ensure that the phone and receiver are connected to the same Wlan and than try the "Search" command from the application menu. When this command shows your receiver, just select it to connect.

google_play_reviews.content: Much better than the stock. I still wish for the tunein control improvement, but i guess its all device demendant

This app makes a phenomenal difference in the usage of Onkyo receivers. The default app by Onkyo is almost comical in its lack of usability, while this app is clearly designed, easy-to-use, and very helpful especially in two zone setups. One minor enhancement request for this app would be to support changing FM tuner stations. Thanks to the app creator!

This app is outstanding and it works flawlessly with TX-8270. I'd like to suggest a couple of minor improvements - providing a quick toggle for the Music Optimizer function (that is, the "MOT" ISCP message), and replacing the current preset-cycling controls under the Device/Settings section with individual buttons (e.g. 'Off', 'A', 'B', 'A+B' for speaker selection) to allow for faster access to the different options. You are doing a great job with this app, keep trucking!
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ivan, thank you for feedback! I created a new issue on github: https://github.com/mkulesh/onpc/issues/70
It is now implemented. Could you please test this issue with the latest nightly build? If you have any questions please write me on mikhail.kulesh@gmail.com

google_play_reviews.content: Much better than the official app!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback. If you have any ideas how to improve the app, please visit the project page on https://github.com/mkulesh/onpc add feel free to open an issue

google_play_reviews.content: werkt goed perfect ...thanks. only volume button to smal
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback! Could you please add a ticket on https://github.com/mkulesh/onpc/issues?

google_play_reviews.content: It works! Unlike the crappy Onkyo app you can find the amp via ip address; something Onkyo doesn't let you do. Thanks for making this!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for feedback!

google_play_reviews.content: Very nice alternative to Onkyo app. always getting better and working well.
